5.statement:
Given a int array B, where B[i] is the number of bananas on ith tree , a monkey can go from ith tree to jth tree if and only if ith tree has atleast j-i bananas, in other words if monkey is at ith tree, it can jump to any tree at jth place where:
0 <= j <= nums[i] and
i + j < n,
return the minimum numbers of jumps monkey would need to reach last tree if it starts from 0th tree , note that monkey cannot carry bananas from one tree to another
